title: Lol logo pops up then disappears
body: This first started happening three days ago. I would double click lol to start client as normal but only the logo appears and the disappears, no yellow bar, nothing will show up in task manager either when I try. I have spent the past three days searching through forums and videos to try and fix it but nothing is working. I've sent a ticket and i'm waiting for a reply. Any help would be greatly appreciated.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Can you attach your latest launcher/patcher logs for me? You can put these on pastebin, or email them through to **oce-wrenchmen@googlegroups.com**, if emailing please include a link to your thread in the message.

The logs can be found in the following path by default

>C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Logs\Patcher Logs
